metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9110 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In OpenEXR 2.2.0, an invalid read of size 2 in the hufDecode function in ImfHuf.cpp could cause the application to crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1').
